price: (Aburahamu) aravuga ati “None se ni nde wakwiheba mu mpuhwe za Nyagasani we, usibye abayobye?”
arabic: قَالَ وَمَن يَقۡنَطُ مِن رَّحۡمَةِ رَبِّهِۦٓ إِلَّا ٱلضَّآلُّونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: qāla waman yaqnaṭu min raḥmati rabbihi illā al-ḍālūna
